review: Super quick set up. So easy to use my 4 year old can find her own shows without my help. Not 5 star because sometimes I have to back out of app and reload. Hoping for more apps that work with it.  SO much easier to use the tablet instead of the remote.  Great Price.  Great product. I expect nothing less from google.
author: Amazon Customer

review: I got one for myself as well as my parents as presents and it's just awesome. Their tv had USB ports but wasn't a smart T.V. as much of the T.V's are today. So when I bought them this, they were able to watch their Netflix/Hulu/Youtube videos on their big screen. It was extremely easy to set up and no fuss. It is completely wireless which means less wires to deal with.
author: Amazon Customer
